Commentary.Commentary: First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Shane Duffy.
Attempt blocked. Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Mohamed Salah.
Attempt missed. Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Trent Alexander-Arnold.
Dejan Lovren (Liverpool) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Beram Kayal (Brighton and Hove Albion).
Offside, Liverpool. Georginio Wijnaldum tries a through ball, but Trent Alexander-Arnold is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Sadio ManÃ© (Liverpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dominic Solanke with a through ball.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Solly March.
Attempt missed. Virgil van Dijk (Liverpool) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Georginio Wijnaldum with a cross following a corner.
Attempt missed. Trent Alexander-Arnold (Liverpool) left footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Sadio ManÃ©.
Commentary.Shot where: the right side of the box
Commentary.Net Location: high and wide to the left
